skillTree.localised_description: Waystalkers are no more than their next hunt. Every breath advances their chase, bringing them closer to victory.

effects.description:
Reload time reduction: +15% during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Trickster God knows all manner of ploys and ruses that can be used to counter missile attacks.
Knowledge can be used as a shield against magical attack.
When it comes to the art of survival, there's no one who can match Kalara's finely-honed abilities.

effects.description:
Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: When the arrow flies farther, it may kill sooner, which is vital in the Hunt.
Nook and fire. Nook again, and fire. Nook a third time, and fire. All in a heartbeat.
The forest teaches a warrior not only when to fire but where, which makes a bigger difference.
Always willing to fight on, a widened quiver allows arrows to rain, almost without end.
What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.
By all means summon the bloodthirsty Goddess of the Hunt to assist you, but always make sure you thank her afterwards…
The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.
Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.
When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
The Lord sets their eye upon the foe, imbuing their troops with Kurnous' spirit and the will to see his enemies destroyed.
Waystalkers’ keen eyes can spot an enemy at a distance that defies belief, and so they demand the same of their troops.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.
This unit can fire while on the move.
This unit remains hidden while firing.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

enabled_if: No enemy presence in ability range

items.colour_text: Masterfully crafted in every way, this precision bow puts similar weapons to shame.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Kalara moves swiftly, almost unseen, with a sleekness of purpose as well as motion.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.
Those whom the Mage Queen has favoured fight as if powered by her hand.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +10
	(own army)

Melee attack: +8 during forest battles
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The first arrow of battle must fly truest.
Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.
Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
